post.text: Today, I unveiled my 100-day plan -- a plan that will create jobs and a stronger economy, a plan with a solid strategy to finally defeat and end ISIS, a plan that paves the way for a greater America -- an America that WINS again. Believe me, as President I will do more in 100 days than Hillary could in a lifetime -- she's had 30 years and done NOTHING. #ImWithYou! #DrainTheSwamp

replies.author: Aza
replies.text: Why? Because he speaks the truth about the state of our Country? What's wrong with what he said? I don't really hear Hillary speaking our Country like this? You're ok continuing down the same road we're on? You honestly can't see the validity in what he's saying?

replies.author: Landon
replies.text: OH and you say he speaks the truth, fact check and you will see the truth!!

replies.author: Amanda
replies.text: Landon . You may vote for Hillary, meaning higher taxes for your family, much higher health care premiums due to expanded Obamacare, more illegal immigrants everywhere getting your jobs, terrorists masquerading as refugees moving to your neighborhood - it's your choice. But don't think I'm as dumb as you are, I'm not voting for Hillary, and very few Americans will.
